text: HRa <7e TTHTfgifea5rut (a335 qRdev er TTHrf 47R4, 4Ra Hrar) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Goverment of India) {r44q Tqa #-5 & 6, #ier-10, Enau, # Roch 110 075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 34/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/Environment/ 2025 Circular No. 7.4.18/2025 dated 11th June, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No EGHDIV-12030/9/2025-ENV & GHD Division (Comp. No. 276967)} Sub: Institution of NHAI Green Highways Excellence Awards-reg: The National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) has decided to institute the "NHAI Green Highways Excellence Awards as mandated in the Green Highways Policy, 2015. The objective of the Award is to recognize and reward exemplary Plantation Efforts carried out along the National Highways by various Agencies and promote such works for wider replications: 2. The proposal was approved in the 660thMeeting of Executive Committee of NHAI held on 03.04.2025_ Accordingly, it is decided to confer Annual Awards to Plantation Agencies in the following Categories: Avenue Plantations (3 Awards) Median Plantations (3 Awards) Plantation in Land Parcels Clover Leaf, Interchange, Toll Plaza , Service Area etc: for Oxygen Park, Dense Plantation including Miyawaki Plantation etc. (3 Award) 3 The detailed criteria which will form the basis of evaluation for Awards is appended as Annexure-I. 4. Application form calling  for nominations for NHAI  Green  Highways Excellence Awards is attached as Annexure-II. 5_ Nominations will be invited from ROs/PDs preferably in the month of February: The Plantations raised by 31st January of the Plantation Year will be eligible for consideration for the Award_ 6_ Initial screening of nominations will be carried out in Green Highways Division and the selection for award will be done with the help of Awards Committee. 7. This issue with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl:: As stated above. oc| &" (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) Vc Chief General Manager (Coord.)
